DOC.brief_summary: What is the course of migraine headache recurrence, how is it managed, what characteristics are associated with it, and how does it influence patient satisfaction with treatment?
DOC.brief_title: The Evolution and Management of Migraine Recurrence Beyond 24 Hours
DOC.criteria: Female and male patients at University Headache Center with > 6 month diagnosis of migraine with and/or without aura (ICHDII) Greater than or equal to 18 years old Greater than 15 days/month total headache days Analgesic use greater than 15 days/month (other than aspirin less than or equal to 325mg/d)
